Name: CRASH-SAN
About the game: It is said that there is a treasure hidden in this land... Can you find it? Find it! Everything in the world will be there. CRASH-SAN destroys the spirit. Use jumps and guns to get the treasure before the spirit is destroyed. Will your spirit remain normal? One adventurer travels across a vast land in search of a vast amount of treasure. Become an adventurer and overcome various challenges to become a brave champion who conquers the world. Collect gold coins scattered around the world. When all the pieces are in place, the doors of the world will open. Mouse and keyboard support. Action game. Exhilarating and wonderful music. Aim for the goal with limited lives. There is a save point, so save often! Three different stages await you. Each stage has traps to make you suffer. The enemy is coming at you, avoid him! Play alone. Multi-compatible... You will feel a sense of accomplishment when you clear a stage after challenging it many times.
